meanings.definition: To remove dust from a surface by wiping or brushing.
meanings.sent1: Please dust the shelves before the guests arrive.
meanings.sent2: I need to dust the furniture in the living room.
meanings.sent3: She dusted off her hands after working in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The housekeeper dusted the entire house in just an hour.
meanings.sent5: He dusted the old bookshelf, revealing its true beauty.

meanings.definition: To sprinkle with a powdery substance.
meanings.sent1: The chef will dust the cake with powdered sugar before serving.
meanings.sent2: She likes to dust her pancakes with cinnamon for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The baker decided to dust the cookies with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent4: The artist will dust the painting with glitter for a special effect.
meanings.sent5: He will dust the dessert with cocoa powder for a finishing touch.
